Name:
Kandelfels
Pinguin
Builder:
Deschimag A.G. Weser
Deschimag A.G. Weser, Bremen
Fate:
Requisition by Kriegsmarine, 1939
Sunk in the Indian Ocean, 8 May 1941
Armament:
